price: Indeed, on that Day the people of Paradise will be busy enjoying themselves,
arabic: إِنَّ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ فِي شُغُلٖ فَٰكِهُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
